comment: Variant of ~ frcond2 : Any two (different) vertices in a friendship graph have a unique common neighbor. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 12-May-2021.) (Proof shortened by AV, 4-Jan-2022.)
